<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shrinking Potion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2958)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=672" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Onset** 1 minute

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fungus-flavored potion conveys the effects of the [_shrink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=284) spell to make you and all your gear smaller. After the onset, you remain small for 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Shrinking Potion
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<title
level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>
Shrinking Potion (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 564 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This potion has no onset, lasts for 1 hour, and grants the effects of a 4th-rank _shrink_ spell. In addition, you gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while shrunken.
